channel.title: SLES on openQA bites
channel.description: Recent content in SLES on openQA bites

item.title: BCI test tutorial
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: Base Container Images (BCI) are a SUSE offer for a variety of container images suitable for building custom applications atop of the SUSE Linux Enterprise (SLE).

item.title: Run Azure images in Hyper-V or kvm
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: Disclaimer: This blog post is about SUSE Linux Enterprise Server images on Azure and probably only useful to SUSE Employees who work with such images.
